issue.title: parser fails on numbers in modX sequence

content.raw:
Hi, thank you for reporting this!

I must admit I should have paid more attention to our own documentation. I didn't really remember that modX was supposed to support numbers in labels.
This shouldn't be too hard to fix, though. Should I try or should I wait for a PR, because I see you've just forked the repo?
content.html:
Hi, thank you for reporting this!

I must admit I should have paid more attention to our own documentation. I didn't really remember that modX was supposed to support numbers in labels. This shouldn't be too hard to fix, though. Should I try or should I wait for a PR, because I see you've just forked the repo?
